p: Finally, the essential oil from Mesosphaerum sidifolium (syn. Hyptis umbrosa) and its major component, fenchone ( 253), were tested against Ehrlich tumor cells implanted in the peritoneal cavity of female mice. The authors reported that the essential oil (100 and 150 mg/kg) and fenchone ( 253) (60 mg/kg) were able to reduce all analyzed parameters related to tumor (volume, mass and total viable cells). Furthermore, it was found that both treatments caused a blockage in the cell cycle progression ( Rolim et al., 2017).
